channel.title: Big Snow Tiny Conf 2016: Ski conference for web business founders
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
@bradt, @CasJam and I run two conferences that will be opening up registration soon:
http://bigsnowtinyconf.com (held in Vermont in Jan 2016)
and
http://bigsnowtinyconfwest.com (held in Colorado in Feb 2016)
Each conference will have only a few spots (thus the "tiny conf" moniker) so if you think you want to go, be sure to get on the mailing list(s) for the right one for you.
Hope to see you there! -Dave

item.title: Big Snow Tiny Conf 2016: Ski conference for web business founders
item.dc:creator: bradt
item.description:
Just a heads up, there’s only 3 tickets left for East: http://bigsnowtinyconf.com/#register

West tickets just went on sale now: http://bigsnowtinyconfwest.com/signup/

Read full topic
